About Me

Hey there! Im primarily a Drupal Backend developer with over 9 years of extensive experience in developing drupal web application across multiple domains like Ecommerce, Education, Healthcare etc. Ive worked in drupal projects of varying complexies and diverse application and requirements. Openscholar is a drupal distribution made specifically for University websites. It is used by world's leading university like Havard, University of Virgina, Princton University etc

Digicare is Patient Support application used for people with Long term chronic disease like arthritis and diabetis, serving as platform to help patient co-ordinate with doctors, nurses and pharmacist on a single application.
